pages.text: $(8)The Skill Tree is unlocked in the same order as it is showed in the GUI. $(br2)The Skill Tree is opened with the Skill Tree keybind ('K' by default). $(br2)Some skills must be maxed before unlocking the next one. $(br2)Speed skill and Damage skill can reach level 10.$(br)HP skill can reach level 5.$(br)Jump skill and Pelt skill can reach up to level 3.$(br)And Stealth skill is not upgradeable but just unlocked.$(br)
pages.title: Skill Tree System

pages.text: $(8)The Skill tree currently has 6 different skills to unlock, which might change or more might be added in future updates.$(br)
